p: Each time a pandemic successfully emerged, we estimated its R eff by fitting the corresponding (empirical or homogeneous) single strain ODE network model (defined by equations in 1) to the simulated pandemic time series. The procedure is as described in the Data and model fitting section, with two alterations: (1) we fix the introduction time to that specified by the simulation scenario and only estimate the transmission rate, and (2) we fit the model to the cumulative incidence of the pandemic virus. To then obtain an R 0 estimate, we plugged the estimated pandemic transmission rate and full degree distribution into eq 3.
